Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game

Class RenderLayer

java.lang.Object
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.RenderLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Drawable>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HUD, Scene
public abstract class RenderLayer extends Object implements Iterable<Drawable>
Provides a layer of Drawables that can be displayed on a Window. The collection index of an element is also its z-index. If two elements overlap each other, the one with the higher index will be displayed over the other one. This class is the base of the Scene and HUD classes.

    • refreshBackgroundTexture

      public void refreshBackgroundTexture()
      Re-applies the render layer background image. This method is called automatically when the window is resized to also resize the background image.

    • add

      public void add(int index, @NotNull @NotNull Drawable element)
      Inserts the specified object at the specified position in this render layer. Shifts the object currently at that position (if any) and any subsequent objects to the right (adds one to their indices).
      Parameters:
      index - the index at which the specified object is to be inserted
      element - object to be added

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if this render layer changed as a result of the call

    • add

      public boolean add(int index, @NotNull @NotNull Collection<? extends Drawable> collection)
      Inserts all of the objects in the specified collection into this render layer at the specified position (optional operation). Shifts the object currently at that position (if any) and any subsequent objects to the right (increases their indices).
      Parameters:
      index - the index at which to insert the first object from the specified collection
      collection - a collection containing objects to be added to this render layer
      Returns:
      true if this render layer changed as a result of the call

    • scheduleToAdd

      public void scheduleToAdd(@NotNull @NotNull Drawable object)
      Schedules an object to add to this render layer. All scheduled objects will be added before the nearest loop/draw iteration.
      Parameters:
      object - an object to add to this scene

      Returns:

    • remove

      public Drawable remove(int index)
      Removes the object at the specified position in this render layer. Shifts any subsequent objects to the left (subtracts one from their indices).
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the object to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the object that was removed from the list

    • scheduleToRemove

      public void scheduleToRemove(@NotNull @NotNull Drawable object)

      Parameters:
      object - an object to add to this scene

      public boolean removeIf(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<? super Drawable> filter)
      Removes all of the objects of this render layer that satisfy the given predicate. Errors or runtime exceptions thrown during iteration or by the predicate are relayed to the caller.
      Parameters:
      filter - a predicate which returns true for objects to be removed
      Returns:
      true if any objects were removed

    • bringToTop

      public void bringToTop(@NotNull @NotNull Drawable object)
      Moves the specified object to the end of the render layer collection so that it is drawn last on the window and therefore above all other objects.
      Parameters:
      object - the object to be moved to the z-axis top of the render layer

    • bringToBottom

      public void bringToBottom(@NotNull @NotNull Drawable object)
      Moves the specified object to the front of the render layer collection so that it is drawn first on the window and therefore below all other objects.
      Parameters:
      object - the object to be moved to the z-axis bottom of the render layer

    • asList

      public List<Drawable> asList()
      Creates an immutable list containing the elements of this render layer, in the same order as they are inside the render layer. Query operations on the returned list "read through" to the specified list, and attempts to modify the returned list, whether direct or via its iterator, result in an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Returns:
      an immutable list containing the elements of this render layer

    • runScheduledActions

      protected void runScheduledActions()
      This method is called automatically before every loop/draw iteration of a render layer. Calling it manually might cause a ConcurrentModificationException to be thrown and thus is not recommended.
